Field.name: up
Field.desc: Camera up vector (rotation over its axis)

Field.name: fovy
Field.desc: Camera field-of-view apperture in Y (degrees) in perspective, used as near plane width in orthographic

Field.name: zoom
Field.desc: Camera zoom (scaling), should be 1.0f by default

Field.name: vertexCount
Field.desc: Number of vertices stored in arrays

Field.name: triangleCount
Field.desc: Number of triangles stored (indexed or not)

Field.name: texcoords
Field.desc: Vertex texture coordinates (UV - 2 components per vertex) (shader-location = 1)

Field.name: texcoords2
Field.desc: Vertex second texture coordinates (useful for lightmaps) (shader-location = 5)

Field.name: indices
Field.desc: Vertex indices (in case vertex data comes indexed)

Field.name: boneIds
Field.desc: Vertex bone ids, up to 4 bones influence by vertex (skinning)

Field.name: boneWeights
Field.desc: Vertex bone weight, up to 4 bones influence by vertex (skinning)

Field.name: vboId
Field.desc: OpenGL Vertex Buffer Objects id (default vertex data)

Field.name: sampleSize
Field.desc: Bit depth (bits per sample): 8, 16, 32 (24 not supported)

Field.name: buffer
Field.desc: Pointer to internal data used by the audio system

Field.name: sampleSize
Field.desc: Bit depth (bits per sample): 8, 16, 32 (24 not supported)

Field.name: ctxData
Field.desc: Audio context data, depends on type

Field.name: eyeToScreenDistance
Field.desc: Distance between eye and display in meters

Function.name: InitWindow
Function.desc: Initialize window and OpenGL context

Function.name: WindowShouldClose
Function.desc: Check if KEY_ESCAPE pressed or Close icon pressed

Function.name: CloseWindow
Function.desc: Close window and unload OpenGL context

Function.name: IsWindowReady
Function.desc: Check if window has been initialized successfully

Function.name: IsWindowFullscreen
Function.desc: Check if window is currently fullscreen

Function.name: IsWindowHidden
Function.desc: Check if window is currently hidden (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: IsWindowMinimized
Function.desc: Check if window is currently minimized (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: IsWindowMaximized
Function.desc: Check if window is currently maximized (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: IsWindowFocused
Function.desc: Check if window is currently focused (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: IsWindowResized
Function.desc: Check if window has been resized last frame

Function.name: IsWindowState
Function.desc: Check if one specific window flag is enabled

Function.name: SetWindowState
Function.desc: Set window configuration state using flags

Function.name: ClearWindowState
Function.desc: Clear window configuration state flags

Function.name: ToggleFullscreen
Function.desc: Toggle window state: fullscreen/windowed (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: MaximizeWindow
Function.desc: Set window state: maximized, if resizable (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: MinimizeWindow
Function.desc: Set window state: minimized, if resizable (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: RestoreWindow
Function.desc: Set window state: not minimized/maximized (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: SetWindowIcon
Function.desc: Set icon for window (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: SetWindowTitle
Function.desc: Set title for window (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: SetWindowPosition
Function.desc: Set window position on screen (only PLATFORM_DESKTOP)

Function.name: SetWindowMonitor
Function.desc: Set monitor for the current window (fullscreen mode)

Function.name: SetWindowMinSize
Function.desc: Set window minimum dimensions (for FLAG_WINDOW_RESIZABLE)

Function.name: SetWindowSize
Function.desc: Set window dimensions

Function.name: GetWindowHandle
Function.desc: Get native window handle

Function.name: GetScreenWidth
Function.desc: Get current screen width

Function.name: GetScreenHeight
Function.desc: Get current screen height

Function.name: GetMonitorCount
Function.desc: Get number of connected monitors

Function.name: GetCurrentMonitor
Function.desc: Get current connected monitor

Function.name: GetMonitorPosition
Function.desc: Get specified monitor position

Function.name: GetMonitorWidth
Function.desc: Get specified monitor width (max available by monitor)

Function.name: GetMonitorHeight
Function.desc: Get specified monitor height (max available by monitor)

Function.name: GetMonitorPhysicalWidth
Function.desc: Get specified monitor physical width in millimetres

Function.name: GetMonitorPhysicalHeight
Function.desc: Get specified monitor physical height in millimetres

Function.name: GetMonitorRefreshRate
Function.desc: Get specified monitor refresh rate

Function.name: GetWindowPosition
Function.desc: Get window position XY on monitor

Function.name: GetWindowScaleDPI
Function.desc: Get window scale DPI factor

Function.name: GetMonitorName
Function.desc: Get the human-readable, UTF-8 encoded name of the primary monitor

Function.name: SetClipboardText
Function.desc: Set clipboard text content

Function.name: GetClipboardText
Function.desc: Get clipboard text content

Function.name: ShowCursor
Function.desc: Shows cursor

Function.name: HideCursor
Function.desc: Hides cursor

Function.name: IsCursorHidden
Function.desc: Check if cursor is not visible

Function.name: EnableCursor
Function.desc: Enables cursor (unlock cursor)

Function.name: DisableCursor
Function.desc: Disables cursor (lock cursor)

Function.name: IsCursorOnScreen
Function.desc: Check if cursor is on the screen

Function.name: ClearBackground
Function.desc: Set background color (framebuffer clear color)

Function.name: BeginDrawing
Function.desc: Setup canvas (framebuffer) to start drawing

Function.name: EndDrawing
Function.desc: End canvas drawing and swap buffers (double buffering)

Function.name: BeginMode2D
Function.desc: Begin 2D mode with custom camera (2D)

Function.name: EndMode2D
Function.desc: Ends 2D mode with custom camera

Function.name: BeginMode3D
Function.desc: Begin 3D mode with custom camera (3D)

Function.name: EndMode3D
Function.desc: Ends 3D mode and returns to default 2D orthographic mode

Function.name: BeginTextureMode
Function.desc: Begin drawing to render texture

Function.name: EndTextureMode
Function.desc: Ends drawing to render texture

Function.name: BeginShaderMode
Function.desc: Begin custom shader drawing

Function.name: EndShaderMode
Function.desc: End custom shader drawing (use default shader)

Function.name: BeginBlendMode
Function.desc: Begin blending mode (alpha, additive, multiplied, subtract, custom)

Function.name: EndBlendMode
Function.desc: End blending mode (reset to default: alpha blending)

Function.name: BeginScissorMode
Function.desc: Begin scissor mode (define screen area for following drawing)

Function.name: EndScissorMode
Function.desc: End scissor mode

Function.name: BeginVrStereoMode
Function.desc: Begin stereo rendering (requires VR simulator)

Function.name: EndVrStereoMode
Function.desc: End stereo rendering (requires VR simulator)

Function.name: LoadVrStereoConfig
Function.desc: Load VR stereo config for VR simulator device parameters

Function.name: UnloadVrStereoConfig
Function.desc: Unload VR stereo config

Function.name: LoadShader
Function.desc: Load shader from files and bind default locations

Function.name: LoadShaderFromMemory
Function.desc: Load shader from code strings and bind default locations

Function.name: GetShaderLocation
Function.desc: Get shader uniform location

Function.name: GetShaderLocationAttrib
Function.desc: Get shader attribute location

Function.name: SetShaderValue
Function.desc: Set shader uniform value

Function.name: SetShaderValueV
Function.desc: Set shader uniform value vector

Function.name: SetShaderValueMatrix
Function.desc: Set shader uniform value (matrix 4x4)

Function.name: SetShaderValueTexture
Function.desc: Set shader uniform value for texture (sampler2d)

Function.name: UnloadShader
Function.desc: Unload shader from GPU memory (VRAM)

Function.name: GetMouseRay
Function.desc: Get a ray trace from mouse position

Function.name: GetCameraMatrix
Function.desc: Get camera transform matrix (view matrix)

Function.name: GetCameraMatrix2D
Function.desc: Get camera 2d transform matrix

Function.name: GetWorldToScreen
Function.desc: Get the screen space position for a 3d world space position

Function.name: GetWorldToScreenEx
Function.desc: Get size position for a 3d world space position

Function.name: GetWorldToScreen2D
Function.desc: Get the screen space position for a 2d camera world space position

Function.name: GetScreenToWorld2D
Function.desc: Get the world space position for a 2d camera screen space position

Function.name: SetTargetFPS
Function.desc: Set target FPS (maximum)

Function.name: GetFPS
Function.desc: Get current FPS

Function.name: GetFrameTime
Function.desc: Get time in seconds for last frame drawn (delta time)

Function.name: GetTime
Function.desc: Get elapsed time in seconds since InitWindow()

Function.name: GetRandomValue
Function.desc: Get a random value between min and max (both included)

Function.name: TakeScreenshot
Function.desc: Takes a screenshot of current screen (filename extension defines format)

Function.name: SetConfigFlags
Function.desc: Setup init configuration flags (view FLAGS)

Function.name: TraceLog
Function.desc: Show trace log messages (LOG_DEBUG, LOG_INFO, LOG_WARNING, LOG_ERROR...)

Function.name: SetTraceLogLevel
Function.desc: Set the current threshold (minimum) log level

Function.name: MemAlloc
Function.desc: Internal memory allocator

Function.name: MemRealloc
Function.desc: Internal memory reallocator

Function.name: MemFree
Function.desc: Internal memory free

Function.name: SetTraceLogCallback
Function.desc: Set custom trace log

Function.name: SetLoadFileDataCallback
Function.desc: Set custom file binary data loader

Function.name: SetSaveFileDataCallback
Function.desc: Set custom file binary data saver

Function.name: SetLoadFileTextCallback
Function.desc: Set custom file text data loader

Function.name: SetSaveFileTextCallback
Function.desc: Set custom file text data saver

Function.name: LoadFileData
Function.desc: Load file data as byte array (read)

Function.name: UnloadFileData
Function.desc: Unload file data allocated by LoadFileData()

Function.name: SaveFileData
Function.desc: Save data to file from byte array (write), returns true on success

Function.name: LoadFileText
Function.desc: Load text data from file (read), returns a '\0' terminated string

Function.name: UnloadFileText
Function.desc: Unload file text data allocated by LoadFileText()

Function.name: SaveFileText
Function.desc: Save text data to file (write), string must be '\0' terminated, returns true on success

Function.name: FileExists
Function.desc: Check if file exists

Function.name: DirectoryExists
Function.desc: Check if a directory path exists

Function.name: IsFileExtension
Function.desc: Check file extension (including point: .png, .wav)

Function.name: GetFileExtension
Function.desc: Get pointer to extension for a filename string (includes dot: '.png')

Function.name: GetFileName
Function.desc: Get pointer to filename for a path string

Function.name: GetFileNameWithoutExt
Function.desc: Get filename string without extension (uses static string)

Function.name: GetDirectoryPath
Function.desc: Get full path for a given fileName with path (uses static string)

Function.name: GetPrevDirectoryPath
Function.desc: Get previous directory path for a given path (uses static string)

Function.name: GetWorkingDirectory
Function.desc: Get current working directory (uses static string)

Function.name: GetDirectoryFiles
Function.desc: Get filenames in a directory path (memory should be freed)

Function.name: ClearDirectoryFiles
Function.desc: Clear directory files paths buffers (free memory)

Function.name: ChangeDirectory
Function.desc: Change working directory, return true on success

Function.name: IsFileDropped
Function.desc: Check if a file has been dropped into window

Function.name: GetDroppedFiles
Function.desc: Get dropped files names (memory should be freed)

Function.name: ClearDroppedFiles
Function.desc: Clear dropped files paths buffer (free memory)

Function.name: GetFileModTime
Function.desc: Get file modification time (last write time)

Function.name: CompressData
Function.desc: Compress data (DEFLATE algorithm)

Function.name: DecompressData
Function.desc: Decompress data (DEFLATE algorithm)

Function.name: SaveStorageValue
Function.desc: Save integer value to storage file (to defined position), returns true on success

Function.name: LoadStorageValue
Function.desc: Load integer value from storage file (from defined position)

Function.name: OpenURL
Function.desc: Open URL with default system browser (if available)

Function.name: IsKeyPressed
Function.desc: Check if a key has been pressed once

Function.name: IsKeyDown
Function.desc: Check if a key is being pressed

Function.name: IsKeyReleased
Function.desc: Check if a key has been released once

Function.name: IsKeyUp
Function.desc: Check if a key is NOT being pressed

Function.name: SetExitKey
Function.desc: Set a custom key to exit program (default is ESC)

Function.name: GetKeyPressed
Function.desc: Get key pressed (keycode), call it multiple times for keys queued

Function.name: GetCharPressed
Function.desc: Get char pressed (unicode), call it multiple times for chars queued

Function.name: IsGamepadAvailable
Function.desc: Check if a gamepad is available

Function.name: IsGamepadName
Function.desc: Check gamepad name (if available)

Function.name: GetGamepadName
Function.desc: Get gamepad internal name id

Function.name: IsGamepadButtonPressed
Function.desc: Check if a gamepad button has been pressed once

Function.name: IsGamepadButtonDown
Function.desc: Check if a gamepad button is being pressed

Function.name: IsGamepadButtonReleased
Function.desc: Check if a gamepad button has been released once

Function.name: IsGamepadButtonUp
Function.desc: Check if a gamepad button is NOT being pressed

Function.name: GetGamepadButtonPressed
Function.desc: Get the last gamepad button pressed

Function.name: GetGamepadAxisCount
Function.desc: Get gamepad axis count for a gamepad

Function.name: GetGamepadAxisMovement
Function.desc: Get axis movement value for a gamepad axis

Function.name: SetGamepadMappings
Function.desc: Set internal gamepad mappings (SDL_GameControllerDB)

Function.name: IsMouseButtonPressed
Function.desc: Check if a mouse button has been pressed once

Function.name: IsMouseButtonDown
Function.desc: Check if a mouse button is being pressed

Function.name: IsMouseButtonReleased
Function.desc: Check if a mouse button has been released once

Function.name: IsMouseButtonUp
Function.desc: Check if a mouse button is NOT being pressed

Function.name: GetMouseX
Function.desc: Get mouse position X

Function.name: GetMouseY
Function.desc: Get mouse position Y

Function.name: GetMousePosition
Function.desc: Get mouse position XY

Function.name: SetMousePosition
Function.desc: Set mouse position XY

Function.name: SetMouseOffset
Function.desc: Set mouse offset

Function.name: SetMouseScale
Function.desc: Set mouse scaling

Function.name: GetMouseWheelMove
Function.desc: Get mouse wheel movement Y

Function.name: SetMouseCursor
Function.desc: Set mouse cursor

Function.name: GetTouchX
Function.desc: Get touch position X for touch point 0 (relative to screen size)

Function.name: GetTouchY
Function.desc: Get touch position Y for touch point 0 (relative to screen size)

Function.name: GetTouchPosition
Function.desc: Get touch position XY for a touch point index (relative to screen size)

Function.name: SetGesturesEnabled
Function.desc: Enable a set of gestures using flags

Function.name: IsGestureDetected
Function.desc: Check if a gesture have been detected

Function.name: GetGestureDetected
Function.desc: Get latest detected gesture

Function.name: GetTouchPointsCount
Function.desc: Get touch points count

Function.name: GetGestureHoldDuration
Function.desc: Get gesture hold time in milliseconds

Function.name: GetGestureDragVector
Function.desc: Get gesture drag vector

Function.name: GetGestureDragAngle
Function.desc: Get gesture drag angle

Function.name: GetGesturePinchVector
Function.desc: Get gesture pinch delta

Function.name: GetGesturePinchAngle
Function.desc: Get gesture pinch angle

Function.name: SetCameraMode
Function.desc: Set camera mode (multiple camera modes available)

Function.name: UpdateCamera
Function.desc: Update camera position for selected mode

Function.name: SetCameraPanControl
Function.desc: Set camera pan key to combine with mouse movement (free camera)

Function.name: SetCameraAltControl
Function.desc: Set camera alt key to combine with mouse movement (free camera)

Function.name: SetCameraSmoothZoomControl
Function.desc: Set camera smooth zoom key to combine with mouse (free camera)

Function.name: SetCameraMoveControls
Function.desc: Set camera move controls (1st person and 3rd person cameras)

Function.name: SetShapesTexture
Function.desc: Set texture and rectangle to be used on shapes drawing

Function.name: DrawPixel
Function.desc: Draw a pixel

Function.name: DrawPixelV
Function.desc: Draw a pixel (Vector version)

Function.name: DrawLine
Function.desc: Draw a line

Function.name: DrawLineV
Function.desc: Draw a line (Vector version)

Function.name: DrawLineEx
Function.desc: Draw a line defining thickness

Function.name: DrawLineBezier
Function.desc: Draw a line using cubic-bezier curves in-out

Function.name: DrawLineBezierQuad
Function.desc: raw line using quadratic bezier curves with a control point

Function.name: DrawLineStrip
Function.desc: Draw lines sequence

Function.name: DrawCircle
Function.desc: Draw a color-filled circle

Function.name: DrawCircleSector
Function.desc: Draw a piece of a circle

Function.name: DrawCircleSectorLines
Function.desc: Draw circle sector outline

Function.name: DrawCircleGradient
Function.desc: Draw a gradient-filled circle

Function.name: DrawCircleV
Function.desc: Draw a color-filled circle (Vector version)

Function.name: DrawCircleLines
Function.desc: Draw circle outline

Function.name: DrawEllipse
Function.desc: Draw ellipse

Function.name: DrawEllipseLines
Function.desc: Draw ellipse outline

Function.name: DrawRing
Function.desc: Draw ring

Function.name: DrawRingLines
Function.desc: Draw ring outline

Function.name: DrawRectangle
Function.desc: Draw a color-filled rectangle

Function.name: DrawRectangleV
Function.desc: Draw a color-filled rectangle (Vector version)

Function.name: DrawRectangleRec
Function.desc: Draw a color-filled rectangle

Function.name: DrawRectanglePro
Function.desc: Draw a color-filled rectangle with pro parameters

Function.name: DrawRectangleGradientV
Function.desc: Draw a vertical-gradient-filled rectangle

Function.name: DrawRectangleGradientH
Function.desc: Draw a horizontal-gradient-filled rectangle

Function.name: DrawRectangleGradientEx
Function.desc: Draw a gradient-filled rectangle with custom vertex colors

Function.name: DrawRectangleLines
Function.desc: Draw rectangle outline

Function.name: DrawRectangleLinesEx
Function.desc: Draw rectangle outline with extended parameters

Function.name: DrawRectangleRounded
Function.desc: Draw rectangle with rounded edges

Function.name: DrawRectangleRoundedLines
Function.desc: Draw rectangle with rounded edges outline

Function.name: DrawTriangle
Function.desc: Draw a color-filled triangle (vertex in counter-clockwise order!)

Function.name: DrawTriangleLines
Function.desc: Draw triangle outline (vertex in counter-clockwise order!)

Function.name: DrawTriangleFan
Function.desc: Draw a triangle fan defined by points (first vertex is the center)

Function.name: DrawTriangleStrip
Function.desc: Draw a triangle strip defined by points

Function.name: DrawPoly
Function.desc: Draw a regular polygon (Vector version)

Function.name: DrawPolyLines
Function.desc: Draw a polygon outline of n sides

Function.name: DrawPolyLinesEx
Function.desc: Draw a polygon outline of n sides with extended parameters

Function.name: CheckCollisionRecs
Function.desc: Check collision between two rectangles

Function.name: CheckCollisionCircles
Function.desc: Check collision between two circles

Function.name: CheckCollisionCircleRec
Function.desc: Check collision between circle and rectangle

Function.name: CheckCollisionPointRec
Function.desc: Check if point is inside rectangle

Function.name: CheckCollisionPointCircle
Function.desc: Check if point is inside circle

Function.name: CheckCollisionPointTriangle
Function.desc: Check if point is inside a triangle

Function.name: CheckCollisionLines
Function.desc: Check the collision between two lines defined by two points each, returns collision point by reference

Function.name: GetCollisionRec
Function.desc: Get collision rectangle for two rectangles collision

Function.name: LoadImage
Function.desc: Load image from file into CPU memory (RAM)

Function.name: LoadImageRaw
Function.desc: Load image from RAW file data

Function.name: LoadImageAnim
Function.desc: Load image sequence from file (frames appended to image.data)

Function.name: LoadImageFromMemory
Function.desc: Load image from memory buffer, fileType refers to extension: i.e. '.png'

Function.name: UnloadImage
Function.desc: Unload image from CPU memory (RAM)

Function.name: ExportImage
Function.desc: Export image data to file, returns true on success

Function.name: ExportImageAsCode
Function.desc: Export image as code file defining an array of bytes, returns true on success

Function.name: GenImageColor
Function.desc: Generate image: plain color

Function.name: GenImageGradientV
Function.desc: Generate image: vertical gradient

Function.name: GenImageGradientH
Function.desc: Generate image: horizontal gradient

Function.name: GenImageGradientRadial
Function.desc: Generate image: radial gradient

Function.name: GenImageChecked
Function.desc: Generate image: checked

Function.name: GenImageWhiteNoise
Function.desc: Generate image: white noise

Function.name: GenImagePerlinNoise
Function.desc: Generate image: perlin noise

Function.name: GenImageCellular
Function.desc: Generate image: cellular algorithm. Bigger tileSize means bigger cells

Function.name: ImageCopy
Function.desc: Create an image duplicate (useful for transformations)

Function.name: ImageFromImage
Function.desc: Create an image from another image piece

Function.name: ImageText
Function.desc: Create an image from text (default font)

Function.name: ImageTextEx
Function.desc: Create an image from text (custom sprite font)

Function.name: ImageFormat
Function.desc: Convert image data to desired format

Function.name: ImageToPOT
Function.desc: Convert image to POT (power-of-two)

Function.name: ImageCrop
Function.desc: Crop an image to a defined rectangle

Function.name: ImageAlphaCrop
Function.desc: Crop image depending on alpha value

Function.name: ImageAlphaClear
Function.desc: Clear alpha channel to desired color

Function.name: ImageAlphaMask
Function.desc: Apply alpha mask to image

Function.name: ImageAlphaPremultiply
Function.desc: Premultiply alpha channel

Function.name: ImageResize
Function.desc: Resize image (Bicubic scaling algorithm)

Function.name: ImageResizeNN
Function.desc: Resize image (Nearest-Neighbor scaling algorithm)

Function.name: ImageResizeCanvas
Function.desc: Resize canvas and fill with color

Function.name: ImageMipmaps
Function.desc: Compute all mipmap levels for a provided image

Function.name: ImageDither
Function.desc: Dither image data to 16bpp or lower (Floyd-Steinberg dithering)

Function.name: ImageFlipVertical
Function.desc: Flip image vertically

Function.name: ImageFlipHorizontal
Function.desc: Flip image horizontally

Function.name: ImageRotateCW
Function.desc: Rotate image clockwise 90deg

Function.name: ImageRotateCCW
Function.desc: Rotate image counter-clockwise 90deg

Function.name: ImageColorTint
Function.desc: Modify image color: tint

Function.name: ImageColorInvert
Function.desc: Modify image color: invert

Function.name: ImageColorGrayscale
Function.desc: Modify image color: grayscale

Function.name: ImageColorContrast
Function.desc: Modify image color: contrast (-100 to 100)

Function.name: ImageColorBrightness
Function.desc: Modify image color: brightness (-255 to 255)

Function.name: ImageColorReplace
Function.desc: Modify image color: replace color

Function.name: LoadImageColors
Function.desc: Load color data from image as a Color array (RGBA - 32bit)

Function.name: LoadImagePalette
Function.desc: Load colors palette from image as a Color array (RGBA - 32bit)

Function.name: UnloadImageColors
Function.desc: Unload color data loaded with LoadImageColors()

Function.name: UnloadImagePalette
Function.desc: Unload colors palette loaded with LoadImagePalette()

Function.name: GetImageAlphaBorder
Function.desc: Get image alpha border rectangle

Function.name: ImageClearBackground
Function.desc: Clear image background with given color

Function.name: ImageDrawPixel
Function.desc: Draw pixel within an image

Function.name: ImageDrawPixelV
Function.desc: Draw pixel within an image (Vector version)

Function.name: ImageDrawLine
Function.desc: Draw line within an image

Function.name: ImageDrawLineV
Function.desc: Draw line within an image (Vector version)

Function.name: ImageDrawCircle
Function.desc: Draw circle within an image

Function.name: ImageDrawCircleV
Function.desc: Draw circle within an image (Vector version)

Function.name: ImageDrawRectangle
Function.desc: Draw rectangle within an image

Function.name: ImageDrawRectangleV
Function.desc: Draw rectangle within an image (Vector version)

Function.name: ImageDrawRectangleRec
Function.desc: Draw rectangle within an image

Function.name: ImageDrawRectangleLines
Function.desc: Draw rectangle lines within an image

Function.name: ImageDraw
Function.desc: Draw a source image within a destination image (tint applied to source)

Function.name: ImageDrawText
Function.desc: Draw text (using default font) within an image (destination)

Function.name: ImageDrawTextEx
Function.desc: Draw text (custom sprite font) within an image (destination)

Function.name: LoadTexture
Function.desc: Load texture from file into GPU memory (VRAM)

Function.name: LoadTextureFromImage
Function.desc: Load texture from image data

Function.name: LoadTextureCubemap
Function.desc: Load cubemap from image, multiple image cubemap layouts supported

Function.name: LoadRenderTexture
Function.desc: Load texture for rendering (framebuffer)

Function.name: UnloadTexture
Function.desc: Unload texture from GPU memory (VRAM)

Function.name: UnloadRenderTexture
Function.desc: Unload render texture from GPU memory (VRAM)

Function.name: UpdateTexture
Function.desc: Update GPU texture with new data

Function.name: UpdateTextureRec
Function.desc: Update GPU texture rectangle with new data

Function.name: GetTextureData
Function.desc: Get pixel data from GPU texture and return an Image

Function.name: GetScreenData
Function.desc: Get pixel data from screen buffer and return an Image (screenshot)

Function.name: GenTextureMipmaps
Function.desc: Generate GPU mipmaps for a texture

Function.name: SetTextureFilter
Function.desc: Set texture scaling filter mode

Function.name: SetTextureWrap
Function.desc: Set texture wrapping mode

Function.name: DrawTexture
Function.desc: Draw a Texture2D

Function.name: DrawTextureV
Function.desc: Draw a Texture2D with position defined as Vector2

Function.name: DrawTextureEx
Function.desc: Draw a Texture2D with extended parameters

Function.name: DrawTextureRec
Function.desc: Draw a part of a texture defined by a rectangle

Function.name: DrawTextureQuad
Function.desc: Draw texture quad with tiling and offset parameters

Function.name: DrawTextureTiled
Function.desc: Draw part of a texture (defined by a rectangle) with rotation and scale tiled into dest.

Function.name: DrawTexturePro
Function.desc: Draw a part of a texture defined by a rectangle with 'pro' parameters

Function.name: DrawTextureNPatch
Function.desc: Draws a texture (or part of it) that stretches or shrinks nicely

Function.name: DrawTexturePoly
Function.desc: Draw a textured polygon

Function.name: Fade
Function.desc: Get color with alpha applied, alpha goes from 0.0f to 1.0f

Function.name: ColorToInt
Function.desc: Get hexadecimal value for a Color

Function.name: ColorNormalize
Function.desc: Get Color normalized as float [0..1]

Function.name: ColorFromNormalized
Function.desc: Get Color from normalized values [0..1]

Function.name: ColorToHSV
Function.desc: Get HSV values for a Color, hue [0..360], saturation/value [0..1]

Function.name: ColorFromHSV
Function.desc: Get a Color from HSV values, hue [0..360], saturation/value [0..1]

Function.name: ColorAlpha
Function.desc: Get color with alpha applied, alpha goes from 0.0f to 1.0f

Function.name: ColorAlphaBlend
Function.desc: Get src alpha-blended into dst color with tint

Function.name: GetColor
Function.desc: Get Color structure from hexadecimal value

Function.name: GetPixelColor
Function.desc: Get Color from a source pixel pointer of certain format

Function.name: SetPixelColor
Function.desc: Set color formatted into destination pixel pointer

Function.name: GetPixelDataSize
Function.desc: Get pixel data size in bytes for certain format

Function.name: GetFontDefault
Function.desc: Get the default Font

Function.name: LoadFont
Function.desc: Load font from file into GPU memory (VRAM)

Function.name: LoadFontEx
Function.desc: Load font from file with extended parameters

Function.name: LoadFontFromImage
Function.desc: Load font from Image (XNA style)

Function.name: LoadFontFromMemory
Function.desc: Load font from memory buffer, fileType refers to extension: i.e. '.ttf'

Function.name: LoadFontData
Function.desc: Load font data for further use

Function.name: GenImageFontAtlas
Function.desc: Generate image font atlas using chars info

Function.name: UnloadFontData
Function.desc: Unload font chars info data (RAM)

Function.name: UnloadFont
Function.desc: Unload Font from GPU memory (VRAM)

Function.name: DrawFPS
Function.desc: Draw current FPS

Function.name: DrawText
Function.desc: Draw text (using default font)

Function.name: DrawTextEx
Function.desc: Draw text using font and additional parameters

Function.name: DrawTextRec
Function.desc: Draw text using font inside rectangle limits

Function.name: DrawTextRecEx
Function.desc: Draw text using font inside rectangle limits with support for text selection

Function.name: DrawTextCodepoint
Function.desc: Draw one character (codepoint)

Function.name: MeasureText
Function.desc: Measure string width for default font

Function.name: MeasureTextEx
Function.desc: Measure string size for Font

Function.name: GetGlyphIndex
Function.desc: Get index position for a unicode character on font

Function.name: TextCopy
Function.desc: Copy one string to another, returns bytes copied

Function.name: TextIsEqual
Function.desc: Check if two text string are equal

Function.name: TextLength
Function.desc: Get text length, checks for '\0' ending

Function.name: TextFormat
Function.desc: Text formatting with variables (sprintf style)

Function.name: TextSubtext
Function.desc: Get a piece of a text string

Function.name: TextReplace
Function.desc: Replace text string (memory must be freed!)

Function.name: TextInsert
Function.desc: Insert text in a position (memory must be freed!)

Function.name: TextJoin
Function.desc: Join text strings with delimiter

Function.name: TextSplit
Function.desc: Split text into multiple strings

Function.name: TextAppend
Function.desc: Append text at specific position and move cursor!

Function.name: TextFindIndex
Function.desc: Find first text occurrence within a string

Function.name: TextToUpper
Function.desc: Get upper case version of provided string

Function.name: TextToLower
Function.desc: Get lower case version of provided string

Function.name: TextToPascal
Function.desc: Get Pascal case notation version of provided string

Function.name: TextToInteger
Function.desc: Get integer value from text (negative values not supported)

Function.name: TextToUtf8
Function.desc: Encode text codepoint into utf8 text (memory must be freed!)

Function.name: GetCodepoints
Function.desc: Get all codepoints in a string, codepoints count returned by parameters

Function.name: GetCodepointsCount
Function.desc: Get total number of characters (codepoints) in a UTF8 encoded string

Function.name: GetNextCodepoint
Function.desc: Get next codepoint in a UTF8 encoded string; 0x3f('?') is returned on failure

Function.name: CodepointToUtf8
Function.desc: Encode codepoint into utf8 text (char array length returned as parameter)

Function.name: DrawLine3D
Function.desc: Draw a line in 3D world space

Function.name: DrawPoint3D
Function.desc: Draw a point in 3D space, actually a small line

Function.name: DrawCircle3D
Function.desc: Draw a circle in 3D world space

Function.name: DrawTriangle3D
Function.desc: Draw a color-filled triangle (vertex in counter-clockwise order!)

Function.name: DrawTriangleStrip3D
Function.desc: Draw a triangle strip defined by points

Function.name: DrawCube
Function.desc: Draw cube

Function.name: DrawCubeV
Function.desc: Draw cube (Vector version)

Function.name: DrawCubeWires
Function.desc: Draw cube wires

Function.name: DrawCubeWiresV
Function.desc: Draw cube wires (Vector version)

Function.name: DrawCubeTexture
Function.desc: Draw cube textured

Function.name: DrawSphere
Function.desc: Draw sphere

Function.name: DrawSphereEx
Function.desc: Draw sphere with extended parameters

Function.name: DrawSphereWires
Function.desc: Draw sphere wires

Function.name: DrawCylinder
Function.desc: Draw a cylinder/cone

Function.name: DrawCylinderWires
Function.desc: Draw a cylinder/cone wires

Function.name: DrawPlane
Function.desc: Draw a plane XZ

Function.name: DrawRay
Function.desc: Draw a ray line

Function.name: DrawGrid
Function.desc: Draw a grid (centered at (0, 0, 0))

Function.name: LoadModel
Function.desc: Load model from files (meshes and materials)

Function.name: LoadModelFromMesh
Function.desc: Load model from generated mesh (default material)

Function.name: UnloadModel
Function.desc: Unload model (including meshes) from memory (RAM and/or VRAM)

Function.name: UnloadModelKeepMeshes
Function.desc: Unload model (but not meshes) from memory (RAM and/or VRAM)

Function.name: UploadMesh
Function.desc: Upload mesh vertex data in GPU and provide VAO/VBO ids

Function.name: UpdateMeshBuffer
Function.desc: Update mesh vertex data in GPU for a specific buffer index

Function.name: DrawMesh
Function.desc: Draw a 3d mesh with material and transform

Function.name: DrawMeshInstanced
Function.desc: Draw multiple mesh instances with material and different transforms

Function.name: UnloadMesh
Function.desc: Unload mesh data from CPU and GPU

Function.name: ExportMesh
Function.desc: Export mesh data to file, returns true on success

Function.name: LoadMaterials
Function.desc: Load materials from model file

Function.name: LoadMaterialDefault
Function.desc: Load default material (Supports: DIFFUSE, SPECULAR, NORMAL maps)

Function.name: UnloadMaterial
Function.desc: Unload material from GPU memory (VRAM)

Function.name: SetMaterialTexture
Function.desc: Set texture for a material map type (MATERIAL_MAP_DIFFUSE, MATERIAL_MAP_SPECULAR...)

Function.name: SetModelMeshMaterial
Function.desc: Set material for a mesh

Function.name: LoadModelAnimations
Function.desc: Load model animations from file

Function.name: UpdateModelAnimation
Function.desc: Update model animation pose

Function.name: UnloadModelAnimation
Function.desc: Unload animation data

Function.name: UnloadModelAnimations
Function.desc: Unload animation array data

Function.name: IsModelAnimationValid
Function.desc: Check model animation skeleton match

Function.name: GenMeshPoly
Function.desc: Generate polygonal mesh

Function.name: GenMeshPlane
Function.desc: Generate plane mesh (with subdivisions)

Function.name: GenMeshCube
Function.desc: Generate cuboid mesh

Function.name: GenMeshSphere
Function.desc: Generate sphere mesh (standard sphere)

Function.name: GenMeshHemiSphere
Function.desc: Generate half-sphere mesh (no bottom cap)

Function.name: GenMeshCylinder
Function.desc: Generate cylinder mesh

Function.name: GenMeshTorus
Function.desc: Generate torus mesh

Function.name: GenMeshKnot
Function.desc: Generate trefoil knot mesh

Function.name: GenMeshHeightmap
Function.desc: Generate heightmap mesh from image data

Function.name: GenMeshCubicmap
Function.desc: Generate cubes-based map mesh from image data

Function.name: GetMeshBoundingBox
Function.desc: Compute mesh bounding box limits

Function.name: MeshTangents
Function.desc: Compute mesh tangents

Function.name: MeshBinormals
Function.desc: Compute mesh binormals

Function.name: DrawModel
Function.desc: Draw a model (with texture if set)

Function.name: DrawModelEx
Function.desc: Draw a model with extended parameters

Function.name: DrawModelWires
Function.desc: Draw a model wires (with texture if set)

Function.name: DrawModelWiresEx
Function.desc: Draw a model wires (with texture if set) with extended parameters

Function.name: DrawBoundingBox
Function.desc: Draw bounding box (wires)

Function.name: DrawBillboard
Function.desc: Draw a billboard texture

Function.name: DrawBillboardRec
Function.desc: Draw a billboard texture defined by source

Function.name: DrawBillboardPro
Function.desc: Draw a billboard texture defined by source and rotation

Function.name: CheckCollisionSpheres
Function.desc: Check collision between two spheres

Function.name: CheckCollisionBoxes
Function.desc: Check collision between two bounding boxes

Function.name: CheckCollisionBoxSphere
Function.desc: Check collision between box and sphere

Function.name: GetRayCollisionSphere
Function.desc: Get collision info between ray and sphere

Function.name: GetRayCollisionBox
Function.desc: Get collision info between ray and box

Function.name: GetRayCollisionModel
Function.desc: Get collision info between ray and model

Function.name: GetRayCollisionMesh
Function.desc: Get collision info between ray and mesh

Function.name: GetRayCollisionTriangle
Function.desc: Get collision info between ray and triangle

Function.name: GetRayCollisionQuad
Function.desc: Get collision info between ray and quad

Function.name: InitAudioDevice
Function.desc: Initialize audio device and context

Function.name: CloseAudioDevice
Function.desc: Close the audio device and context

Function.name: IsAudioDeviceReady
Function.desc: Check if audio device has been initialized successfully

Function.name: SetMasterVolume
Function.desc: Set master volume (listener)

Function.name: LoadWave
Function.desc: Load wave data from file

Function.name: LoadWaveFromMemory
Function.desc: Load wave from memory buffer, fileType refers to extension: i.e. '.wav'

Function.name: LoadSound
Function.desc: Load sound from file

Function.name: LoadSoundFromWave
Function.desc: Load sound from wave data

Function.name: UpdateSound
Function.desc: Update sound buffer with new data

Function.name: UnloadWave
Function.desc: Unload wave data

Function.name: UnloadSound
Function.desc: Unload sound

Function.name: ExportWave
Function.desc: Export wave data to file, returns true on success

Function.name: ExportWaveAsCode
Function.desc: Export wave sample data to code (.h), returns true on success

Function.name: PlaySound
Function.desc: Play a sound

Function.name: StopSound
Function.desc: Stop playing a sound

Function.name: PauseSound
Function.desc: Pause a sound

Function.name: ResumeSound
Function.desc: Resume a paused sound

Function.name: PlaySoundMulti
Function.desc: Play a sound (using multichannel buffer pool)

Function.name: StopSoundMulti
Function.desc: Stop any sound playing (using multichannel buffer pool)

Function.name: GetSoundsPlaying
Function.desc: Get number of sounds playing in the multichannel

Function.name: IsSoundPlaying
Function.desc: Check if a sound is currently playing

Function.name: SetSoundVolume
Function.desc: Set volume for a sound (1.0 is max level)

Function.name: SetSoundPitch
Function.desc: Set pitch for a sound (1.0 is base level)

Function.name: WaveFormat
Function.desc: Convert wave data to desired format

Function.name: WaveCopy
Function.desc: Copy a wave to a new wave

Function.name: WaveCrop
Function.desc: Crop a wave to defined samples range

Function.name: LoadWaveSamples
Function.desc: Load samples data from wave as a floats array

Function.name: UnloadWaveSamples
Function.desc: Unload samples data loaded with LoadWaveSamples()

Function.name: LoadMusicStream
Function.desc: Load music stream from file

Function.name: LoadMusicStreamFromMemory
Function.desc: Load music stream from data

Function.name: UnloadMusicStream
Function.desc: Unload music stream

Function.name: PlayMusicStream
Function.desc: Start music playing

Function.name: IsMusicStreamPlaying
Function.desc: Check if music is playing

Function.name: UpdateMusicStream
Function.desc: Updates buffers for music streaming

Function.name: StopMusicStream
Function.desc: Stop music playing

Function.name: PauseMusicStream
Function.desc: Pause music playing

Function.name: ResumeMusicStream
Function.desc: Resume playing paused music

Function.name: SetMusicVolume
Function.desc: Set volume for music (1.0 is max level)

Function.name: SetMusicPitch
Function.desc: Set pitch for a music (1.0 is base level)

Function.name: GetMusicTimeLength
Function.desc: Get music time length (in seconds)

Function.name: GetMusicTimePlayed
Function.desc: Get current music time played (in seconds)

Function.name: LoadAudioStream
Function.desc: Load audio stream (to stream raw audio pcm data)

Function.name: UnloadAudioStream
Function.desc: Unload audio stream and free memory

Function.name: UpdateAudioStream
Function.desc: Update audio stream buffers with data

Function.name: IsAudioStreamProcessed
Function.desc: Check if any audio stream buffers requires refill

Function.name: PlayAudioStream
Function.desc: Play audio stream

Function.name: PauseAudioStream
Function.desc: Pause audio stream

Function.name: ResumeAudioStream
Function.desc: Resume audio stream

Function.name: IsAudioStreamPlaying
Function.desc: Check if audio stream is playing

Function.name: StopAudioStream
Function.desc: Stop audio stream

Function.name: SetAudioStreamVolume
Function.desc: Set volume for audio stream (1.0 is max level)

Function.name: SetAudioStreamPitch
Function.desc: Set pitch for audio stream (1.0 is base level)

Function.name: SetAudioStreamBufferSizeDefault
Function.desc: Default size for new audio streams
